Actors: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, Juliette Binoche, James Brolin
Writer: Mikko Alanne (screenplay), Craig Borten (screenplay), Michael Thomas (screenplay), Jose Rivera (screen story), Hector Tobar (book)
Title: The 33
Plot: Based on the real-life event, when a gold and copper mine collapses, it traps 33 miners underground for 69 days.
